body: And just so we don't re-re-design this, I recall one of the motivations for separating these two was to provide a cleaner abstraction between different levels of observers (Net, Operator, Step Net).  I want to make sure these concerns are resolved by reverting to the original design where we simply implemented the rnnCopy method (potentially returning NULL).
